name: 12th International Conference on Information Technology in Education
content: 12th International Conference on Information Technology in Education (ICITE 2024) April 27 \~ 28, 2024, Copenhagen, Denmark https://acsit2024.org/icite/index Scope &Topics 12th International Conference on Information Technology in Education (ICITE 2024) is an interdisciplinary form for educators who wish to improve the quality of instruction through the use of computers and how to implement it effectively into instruction. It also aims to provide a platform for exchanging ideas in new emerging trends that needs more focus and exposure and will attempt to publish proposals that strengthen our goals. Topics of interest include, but are not limited to the following • Collaborative & Interactive Learning • Tools for 21st Century Learning • Education Management Systems • Education Policy and Leadership • Business Education • Virtual and Remote Laboratories • Pedagogy Enhancement With E-Learning • Course Management Systems • Educating the Educators • Professional Development for Teachers in ICT • Teacher Evaluation • Integrating Technology in Curriculum: Challenges & Strategies • Artificial Intelligence, Robotics and Human Computer Interaction in Education • Web-based Tools for Education • Games and Simulations in Education • Learning / Teaching Methodologies and Assessment • Curriculum, Research and Development • Counselor Education • Student Selection Criteria in Interdisciplinary Studies • Global Issues In Education and Research • Technology Support for Pervasive Learning • Learning Analysis • Mobile/ubiquitous Computing in Education • Web 2.0, Social Networking, Blogs and Wikis • Multimedia in Education • Computer Education • e-Learning Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by April 20, 2024\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by Computer Science Conference Proceedings in Computer Science & Information Technology (CS & IT) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from ICITE 2024, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journal.  International Journal on Integrating Technology in Education (IJITE)  International Journal of Education (IJE) Important Dates Second Batch : (Submissions after April 06, 2024) • Submission Deadline : April 20, 2024 • Authors Notification : April 25, 2024 • Registration & camera - Ready Paper Due : April 26, 2024 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : itca@acsit2024.org (or) itcaconf@yahoo.com For other details: https://acsit2024.org/icite/index Paper Submission Link: https://acsit2024.org/submission/index.php
